item.description:
Holcomb Farm is an historic farm used by seven generations of the Holcomb family. The farm was donated to the public for agricultural and educational purposes. They have a nature center, an arts program, and a community supported agricultural operation. We will be hiking to see a viewpoint on the mountain side.

You may visit the center after our walk if you like. Admission is free.

This will be an easy walk of about 2 to 3 miles with one big hill to climb. Social walking pace. We will be out for 2 hours. I have visited this lookout one time, and I will be following the trail map. The walk will be rescheduled if there is a threat of rain.

Dogs and children are welcome as long as they are calm and well behaved. Dogs must be on leash at all times, (local rules).

Location: 113 Simsbury Rd, West Granby, CT.
http://maps.google.co...

item.name: Holcomb Farm Walk, West Granby, CT
